There's one for sale just a few posts down.

posts.post_title: 1889 A35 Goodwin Round Album Mike "King" Kelly
posts.post_content:
Only 2 ever graded... only 1 higher.  Any interest in this A35 Mike Kelly. 
$6k delivered check, Venmo, PPFF or (PPGS add 3%)

Alex Tymchuk
cell: 404-218-0311
Thanks Bobby but I’ve seen that card more than once before including the post a hint below mine 😀 Not a bad card but missing some stronger attributes for the issue.
